turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule a check-up appointment with Dr. Smith. Can you help?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, I can certainly help with that. Let me check Dr. Smith's availability. What days and times work best for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I'm pretty flexible, but ideally, sometime next week. I work Monday through Friday, 9-5, so it'd have to be before or after those hours. Is that even possible?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I've checked the schedule. There's an opening next Tuesday at 8:00 AM and another one next Thursday at 5:30 PM. Which one do you prefer?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, Thursday at 5:30 PM is better. But, can you tell me - what are the cancellation policies? I've had to reschedule appointments before, and I don't want to get hit with any surprise fees.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly. If you cancel or reschedule within 24 hours of the appointment, there is a $50 cancellation fee. If you reschedule before that, there is no fee. Are you ready to book the appointment for Thursday at 5:30 PM?
